text: (allah) antadu: "Miku purvam gatincina jinnatula mariyu manavula samajalu poyi cerina a narakagniloki pravesincandi." Prati samajam (narakanlo) pravesincinapudu tana purvapu varini (samajanni) sapistundi. Tudaku varanta akkada cerina pidapa; taruvata vaccina varu tama kante mundu vaccani varini gurinci: "O ma prabhu! Vire mam'malni margabhrastuluga cesinavaru, kavuna viriki rettimpu narakagni siksa vidhincu!" Ani antaru. Daniki (allah): "Prati vadiki rettimpu (siksa) vidhincabadutundi. Kani miradi telusukoleru!" Ani antadu
